p: Flowering, aerial parts of wild Dracocephalum kotschyi Boiss were collected in July 2014 from Garin Mountain in the Lorestan province, west of Iran. The regionâ€™s altitude was ca. 3300 m above the sea level. The plant material identification was done by Dr. Mehrnia, and a voucher specimen was deposited at the herbarium of the Lorestan Agricultural Research and Natural Resources Center, Khorramabad, Iran.
